Marie Curie as a pioneer in AI for healthcare, working on developing AI for better diagnosis and treatment of diseases.
Galileo Galilei as an AI developer, using his understanding of the scientific method, he would build a new AI that would re-interpret the data of the universe.
Nikola Tesla as a pioneer in renewable energy, using his expertise to create a solar panel that is both sustainable and aesthetically pleasing.
Ben Franklin as an inventor of a machine that turns thoughts into physical objects.
Benjamin Franklin as an inventor of an AI that allows people to harness their full potential by utilizing AI and electricity to power their work.
